org.linqs.psl.model.rule

Interface UnweightedRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Rule, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UnweightedArithmeticRule, UnweightedLogicalRule

    public interface UnweightedRule
extends Rule
    A template for UnweightedGroundRules, which constrain the values that GroundAtoms can take.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WeightedRule relax(float weight, boolean squared)
      Relax the unweighted rule instance by creating a weighted rule that instantiates potentials which act as penalty terms in the inference objective.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.linqs.psl.model.rule.Rule

        ensureRegistration, getCoreAtoms, getGroundingQuery, getName, getRewritableGroundingFormula, ground, groundAll, isRegistered, isWeighted, requiresSplit, split, supportsGroundingQueryRewriting, supportsIndividualGrounding, unregister

    • Method Detail

      • relax

        WeightedRule relax(float weight,
                   boolean squared)
        Relax the unweighted rule instance by creating a weighted rule that instantiates potentials which act as penalty terms in the inference objective. This method must unregister the unweighted rule before constructing the new weighted rule.
